DOC.brief_title: Changes Cancer-related Cytokines After Participation Physical Activity Behavior Change Intervention ( CICK Study )
DOC.criteria: Female breast cancer patient age 18 70 year age diagnosis Stage I , II , IIIA breast cancer currently receive ( plan receive study duration ) chemotherapy radiation therapy . The participant may take long term therapy aromatase inhibitor , estrogen receptor modulators , etc . If patient undergone surgical procedure , must least 8 week postprocedure . English speaking . Medical clearance participation provide primary care physician oncologist . Diagnosis dementia organic brain syndrome . Medical , psychological , social characteristic would interfere ability fully participate program activity assessment ( e.g. , psychosis , schizophrenia , etc. ) . Contraindication participation regular physical activity program . Metastatic recurrent disease Inability ambulate Engaged ≥ 60 minute vigorous physical activity ≥ 150 minute moderate plus vigorous activity per week past month . Anticipates undergo elective surgery duration intervention would interfere intervention participation ( e.g. , breast reconstructive surgery ) . Participant live work within 50 mile study site .
